sentences.english: It was abridged from the original work.
This is a condensed version of the Book; it's only half as long as the original Book.
sentences.chinese: 這是該書的縮寫本，只有原著篇幅的一半。

sentences.english: They are still there if you want to read them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想閱讀，原著還是有得賣的。

sentences.english: This earned both Damon and Affleck Oscars for Best Original Screenplay.
sentences.chinese: 這爲戴蒙與艾弗列克贏得了奧斯卡最佳原著劇本獎。

sentences.english: True to the novel, our heroine is dead from the outset.
sentences.chinese: 同原著一樣，女主角在故事一開始就死亡了。

sentences.english: It should overcome academic one-sidedness while reading their original work.
sentences.chinese: 在通讀原著時，應注意克服學術上的片面性。

sentences.english: I'm studying Greek to read Homer in the original.
sentences.chinese: 我在學習希臘文是爲了讀荷馬原著。

sentences.english: Books in their original versions may send you to dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 原著版本的書籍或許會讓你猛翻字典。

sentences.english: He remembers that he watched the movie first, then read the book.
sentences.chinese: 他還記得自己是先看了電影之後再讀的原著。

sentences.english: This remastered version is faithful to the original, including its unforgiving difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 此修復版的版本忠於原著，包括那些無情的關卡。

sentences.english: We also make some changes, so It’s not exactly the same story.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們對原著做了一些改動，不完全是原來的故事。

sentences.english: This has been adapted for radio from the Russian original.
sentences.chinese: 這部小說已由俄文原著改編成無線電廣播節趴。

sentences.english: Irene has never seen the original English version of this book; only a Chinese translation.
sentences.chinese: 她並沒有看過英文版原著，只看過中譯本。

sentences.english: The play does not agree with the book.
sentences.chinese: 這個劇本與原著不相符。

sentences.english: The author discovered that the translator had foisted several passages into his book.
sentences.chinese: 作者發現翻譯者偷偷在他的原著中插入了幾段文章。

sentences.english: The original money-management favorite is still the best!
sentences.chinese: 這本最受人喜愛的金錢管理原著至今仍然是最好的。
